description:
We've heard your requests for a faster better game. Now including an option to play with three pucks simultaneously! Sounds have been included in the game and small AI improvements. Previous Updates: Paddles are now moved by dragging and performance has increased. 
Pocket Hockey for the Palm Pre brings arcade style Air Hockey to your Palm Pre smart phone. Pocket Hockey features both single player and multiplayer modes so you can play by yourself or with someone else, all on one screen.

Featuring advanced A.I. and Physics as well as crisp graphics your Palm Pre will become an instant hit with family and friends. Get Pockey Hockey for the Palm Pre Today!

If you get any great ideas let us know, we'll probably include it in the next version.
versionNote: Introducing the Triple Puck! Play against a friend or the computer with three pucks on the table.
